FuncDef: The display qos buffer egress-usage command displays the buffer usage for outbound queues on an interface. The display qos buffer egress-usage command displays the buffer usage for outbound queues on an interface. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE6885-LL (low latency mode), CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an interface.
The value is a string case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the type of an interface.
-

Specifies the number of an interface.
The value is a string case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.
